definition: N6-(delta2-Isopentenyl)-adenosine 5'-monophosphate + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> trans-Zeatin riboside monophosphate + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
name: isopentenyladenosine-5'-monophosphate,NADPH---hemoprotein reductase:oxygen oxidoreductase (trans-zeatin-riboside-monophosphate-forming)
